title: Battle Box
briefDescription: A remake of Battle Box from MCC (Minecraft Championship) into a Bedrock Version you and your friends can play on! If you don't know whats ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A remake of Battle Box from MCC (Minecraft Championship) into a Bedrock Version you and your friends can play on! If you don?t know whats Battle Box, it?s a 4 vs 4 minigame where which team have to fill in the middle with 9 wool of their color. They can also kill each other, be aware of that.
I have added tons of commands to prevent cheating in any possible way, so you don?t have to worry about a lot of arguments of intentional game design when a team unfairly wins.
How to Play: You will be put into a lobby where you can choose which team to join, it can be 4v4, 1v1, 1v4, etc.
You should be put into another room once you have chosen a team. Once you and everybody have chosen a team, click ?Start Game.?

After you have clicked ?Start Game,? you should be in the map selector room where you choose a map to play on. For now there is one, I am trying my best to make the most unique maps apart from all, hope you understand.

title: Cp Microbattles
briefDescription: Microbattles is a popular game which there is 4 team and you have to kill all the team you can play with up to 30 players. Me ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Microbattles is a popular game which there is 4 team and you have to kill all the team you can play with up to 30 players. Me and my crew worked really hard on this so please enjoy.

title: All Among Us Maps
briefDescription: This download contains all 3 Among Us maps. The Skeld, MiraHQ and Polus are all rebuilt in Minecraft. You can mess around in these maps or ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This download contains all 3 Among Us maps. The Skeld, MiraHQ and Polus are all rebuilt in Minecraft. You can mess around in these maps or even play PvP on it.
The Skeld:
The Skeld is the original Among Us map with the infamous Electrical.
MiraHQ is the first DLC Among Us map set in a massive skyscraper and a vent system that connects the entire map.

Polus:
Polus is the most recent and biggest map set on a outer space planet.

title: Super Smash Craft: Magic

crawledImageUrls.text: Battle your friends in this versus arena. Choose between the lightning potion, telepearls, speed hook, grass killer, and many more. There?s two maps to pick from so there?s plenty of variety.

title: Skywars by RedTech.co
briefDescription: Fight to the death in this brand new Skywars map made by the RedTech.co build team! Collect items from chests, buy kits in the ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Fight to the death in this brand new Skywars map made by the RedTech.co build team! Collect items from chests, buy kits in the shops, and be the last one standing to win! This game is 2-8 players, and there are over 8 different kits to choose from. Good luck and have fun!

title: Minegames v3.70 [November Update!]
briefDescription: Play with your friends in fun and engaging minigames in Minegames 3! There are 7 minigames, each built with it's own unique gameplay and experiences! Each minigame ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Play with your friends in fun and engaging minigames in Minegames 3! There are 7 minigames, each built with it?s own unique gameplay and experiences! Each minigame was made to give the player the best experience possible! I hope you?ll check it out!

The Bridge is a fast paced 2 team PvP minigame! Your objective is to cross the bridge, try reach the other team?s base, and jump in their goal, which will score you a point! First to 5 points wins! You?ll have swords, armour, a diamond pickaxe and blocks in order to try and defeat the other team! Build a giant wall to defend your base, you rush your opponents all at once to try overwhelm them! The choice is yours! Be the first to score 5 points!

Kitted FFA is another PvP game but this one is an all against all minigame! Choose from one of 12 kits, and once everyone is ready, use the gear you get from your kit to fight other players and become the last player standing! Find out what kit works best for you, because some people are better with some kits than others. (My favourite is Brute!)

Knockoff contains PvP but has mildly less of it. In Knockoff, you?ll be placed on some floating platforms above the void. You get given a Punch 2 Bow, which does a large amount of knockback, in order to try knock your opponents off the platform. You have 5 lives. Once your lives are gone, you are out! Be the last person standing to win!

Playground is a chill minigame. Everyone is placed in the Playground area, and here, you can do whatever you want. You could do parkour. You could have a fight with your friends. You could do archery practice. You could even go AFK if you want to. There is no goal. Just chill out, and do what you want! There?s quite a few things to do, so just enjoy yourself! Keep in mind, you don?t get points in this minigame.

Duels is a, simple to understand, minigame. There are two teams, and both teams get given gear in order to battle out to be the last team standing. The gear the teams are given include, an iron sword, armour, a bow, arrows, and a couple golden apples.

Hide N Seek is just as you?d expect. There is one seeker, and everyone else is a hider. The seeker has to hit a hider once for them to become a seeker as well. The game ends when either the time runs out or there are no hiders left.

Skywars is similar to what you may have seen before. You (and your team) spawn on a sky-island with several chests with randomized loot in them. You goal is to be the last team standing, by using what you can find in your chests. You can use blocks to build over to other sky-islands and find more chests to get better loot. Crafting is also enabled, so you can craft better stuff if you find the resources to do so!
When you win a minigame, you get points. With these points, you can go into the in-game shop and get a trail or head. These won?t be able to be used inside minigames, unless it?s Playground but they?re fun to have and are good for showing off how good you are at winning!

Other info, such as how to start a minigame, how the shop works and more, can be found in the world. You can go to the Info Centre to check out this info, as well as other things. In theory, all important info should be there, but if not, feel free to leave a comment on the MCPEDL page, for me to see. I?ll hopefully reply to a decent amount of them. Hopefully?

title: PVP Madness

Shoutout to ItzSujayYT for helping with this world!

title: PenguinPvP V2 (Morph Hunt, Flooding, & More)
briefDescription: A minigame map with 7 games so far. It has a morph hunt game, a Flooding parkour game, a TNT Run game, Skywars, Minigames, Kit PVP, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A minigame map with 7 games so far. It has a morph hunt game, a Flooding parkour game, a TNT Run game, Skywars, Minigames, Kit PVP, and Survival Walls. Every game auto resets. TNT Run and Flooding can be played with one player. The others require at least 2. Fixed import.
All games auto reset. (Note: PL = Player Count)
Kit PVP: Normal Kit PVP. Custom Item. 2+ PL
Flooding: Complete a parkour course while water rises. If you touch the water you die. 1+ PL
TNT Run: TNT Run. It?s kinda buggy sorry. 1+ PL
SkyWars: Random loot, custom items. 2+ PL
Survival Walls: Gather resources and craft! Custom items and random loot! Each player spawns in a corner. After 6 minutes the walls fall and the best fighter wins! 2+ PL
Minigames: Just some random minigames. 2+ PL
Morph Hunt: This is my favorite. Hider disguises as any animal. The hunter will then have to find the hider in the mass of other animals. Note: The hiders animal will be a 1 shot. If an animals won?t die it?s a real animal.
Above: Flooding Gameplay

title: Riptide Wars
briefDescription: Welcome to Riptide Wars! This non-automated map takes Minecraft PvP to a new level, with a few maps and a lobby & map select, as well ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to Riptide Wars! This non-automated map takes Minecraft PvP to a new level, with a few maps and a lobby & map select, as well as really fun game mechanics with no rules (at least no rules aren?t agreed upon by your 2-5 player party)!
Here are some pictures of the lobby and the new map select:
This is what the spawn looks like:
You have a choice of two settings that affect the gameplay: Weakness & Night Vision

These are some pictures of the original and new maps!
Firstly, the original Riptide Wars map was renamed to the Ruined Cube:
Next, one of the new maps: Pirate Battle!

This one was by far the most detailed and hardest to build. I really hope you enjoy it!
This last map is targeted to those who love simplicity, and minimal detail. It is a very easy map to play in.
It is called the Plain Flats map. Here are some snapshots:

title: Hide And Go Edawg (Updated) 1.16 Bedrock
briefDescription: This was fun Hide and Seek map me my cousins worked on. It has tones hidden secrets and areas to explore. Plus lots of parkour ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This was fun Hide and Seek map me my cousins worked on. It has tones hidden secrets and areas to explore. Plus lots of parkour and some other mini games too like spleef, pig racing,shoot the minecart, Slap them off, connect 4, noughts and crosses (Tic Tac Toe), Foot Race, Isolation, Build Battle and Rock Paper Scissors.

Hide And Go Edawg
The reason why it is called hide and go edawg instead of hide and seek is because we originally built a similar map on a server called edawg and played it there (Server Ip for Java Players: EDAWG878.COM).

Rules of Hide and Go Edawg
Be welcome to play around with certain rules
Main rules of Hide and Go Edawg:
1)No ones allowed to break or place blocks in a match
2)Hider starts game with a knockback wooden sword (If you want to get rid of nametags you can effect the hider with invisibility and give them leather armour or trust the seekers to turn off nametags in their settings)
3)Seeker starts game with Enchanted diamond sword and armour, and a Glistering Melon (Glistering Melons can be used to enter the theme park)
4)Once a hider is found unless there is no hiders left that hider must become seeker.
5)If a Hider dies not from a seeker or a seekers wolf, they must tp back to the hider area (They do not become seeker)
6)The seeker goal is to kill all hiders
7)The Hider goal is to survive for as long as possible, but they can do one of these things.
1.Just Hide
2.Try and visit every area
3.kill a non afk seeker
Other gamemodes:
1.Try Playing the game but give every player and elytra and fireworks
2. Instead of hide and seek try doing survival games by having everyone tp to hider area and locate items around the map. (Have a time at the start where no one can pvp)
3.Try some of the minigames that can be located in spawn

title: Land Strip PVP (2 Player Kit PVP Map)
briefDescription: Land Strip PVP is a 'Kit PVP' map made by; shamwarizim_, CrustaceanTP, and TheSfflux. As the name suggests, the map is a strip of custom ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Land Strip PVP is a ?Kit PVP? map made by; shamwarizim_, CrustaceanTP, and TheSfflux. As the name suggests, the map is a strip of custom built Minecraft terrain. There are currently only three kits; warrior, archer, and wizard, although we are planning on updating the map and adding new features and fixing bugs.

This is the spawn room. Inside the spawn room there are multiple buttons and settings to mess around with, combine, and try out. Along with potion effects there are also ?starter items? these items cannot be obtained from kits and must be selected from the starter item selection panels.
The Map

title: Sumo Masters
briefDescription: Download this map, invite friends, give everyone some snowballs, and become a SUMO MASTER. Features four (4) sumo arenas, settings for the time of day and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Download this map, invite friends, give everyone some snowballs, and become a SUMO MASTER.
Features four (4) sumo arenas, settings for the time of day and weather, and even a snowball button.
After seeing the success of my first minigame map (TNT Run), I decided to follow up with another, even better minigame. Enter, Sumo Masters.
Sumo Masters is worth the 30 seconds it takes to download it; featuring polished gameplay and settings, toggles for the environment, a beautiful map, and multiple arenas.
?Sumo? is a classic Minecraft party game, in which players try to knock the others off of a small platform. The arenas in this map are built small on purpose; specially designed for quick, fun games with a few of your best friends. I don?t recommend more than 4 players/match.
Here?s some images of the map.
The arenas:
